Alex Rasterhoff : Developer

I blend code, creativity, and curiosity to make digital ideas real.

I'm a junior developer with a strong foundation in MBO 4 Software Development and over 2 years of self-teaching. I love solving technical challenges and enjoy building projects that are both useful and well-crafted.

My focus is back-end development, but I enjoy working on creative front-end experiences from time to time too. I believe great software is thoughtful, accessible, and well-designed — not just functional, but delightful to use.

When I'm not coding, I'm usually playing video games, exploring new technologies, or diving into fresh interests on a near-weekly basis.

I’m always eager to learn, collaborate, and take on meaningful work.
